articles.title: NASA shares an image of 300-year-old supernova remnant, Calls it "Kaleidoscope of Colour' - Republic World
articles.description: On Instagram, NASA has posted a photograph of a 300-year-old remnant generated by the supernova explosion of a star 11,000 light-years away from Earth.
articles.content: In an Instagram post, NASA, the US space agency, posted a photograph of a 300-year-old remnant generated by the supernova explosion of a massive star 11,000 light-years away from Earth. It also expla… [+1995 chars]
